meaningMnemonic: Something that you <kanji>wrap</kanji> is a <vocabulary>bundle</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>package</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You learned it when you learned 包む, but here's a reminder of the mnemonic just in case:

Remember how you wrap your <vocabulary>bundle</vocabulary>s? That's right, with the <reading>two two</reading> technique. Your <vocabulary>package</vocabulary>s are always double wrapped.
